media:group.media:title: 24 Oras Weekend Express: June 20, 2020 [HD]
media:group.media:description:
Narito ang mga balitang ating tinutukan ngayong Sabado, June 20, 2020:
-P1.3-M halaga ng shabu, nasabat sa buy-bust operation na nauwi sa habulan
-Pag-angkas, posibleng payagan na pero hihintayin muna ang guidelines bago maipatupad
-3,000-5,000 units ng UV Express, inaasahang magbabalik-pasada sa Lunes
-Will Ashley at Rita Daniela, inalala ang kanilang mga yumaong ama
-PBOAP: Mga tauhan ng bus companies na nawalan ng trabaho, umabot na sa 4,000
-Mahigit 200 OFW mula sa Riyadh, Saudi Arabia at Amerika, balik-bansa na
-Gabbi Garcia, bilib sa pagkamalikhain ng isang guro na nag-ala sanggre para humikayat sa mga magulang at estudyante na mag-enroll
-Kwelang videos ng doktor, nagbibigay impormasyon tungkol sa COVID-19
For Kapuso abroad, subscribe to GMA Pinoy TV (http://www.gmapinoytv.com/) for GMA programs, including the full version of 24 Oras Weekend.
24 Oras Weekend is anchored by Ivan Mayrina and Pia Arcangel, featuring top news stories from the Philippines. Visit GMA News Online (http://www.gmanews.tv/24Oras) for more.

entry.title: 24 Oras News Alert: Subsidy para sa pagbili ng modernized jeepney, dodoblehin ng LTFRB

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras News Alert: Subsidy para sa pagbili ng modernized jeepney, dodoblehin ng LTFRB
media:group.media:description:
Dodoblehin ng LTFRB ang ibibigay na subsidy sa mga operator ng jeepney na nais bumili ng modernized jeepney.

entry.title: 24 Oras News Alert: Philippines reports 943 new COVID-19 cases; total exceeds 29,000

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras News Alert: Philippines reports 943 new COVID-19 cases; total exceeds 29,000
media:group.media:description:
The Philippines on Saturday reported 943 new coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) infections, of which 578 were "fresh" or newly validated and 365 were late, bringing the total tally to 29,400.
